title: Provide Case Update to Inquiring Client
description: A client calls asking for a quick update on their case. The assigned paralegal needs to provide a concise and accurate status.

tasks.description: Identify the client and their active matter in the case management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the correct case file.

tasks.description: Review the case timeline and recent activity notes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent quickly understands the current stage of the case (e.g., 'in written discovery').

tasks.description: Verbally communicate the current status to the client and mention the next one or two upcoming events or deadlines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, reassuring, and accurate update to the client.
